thread.title: Poor Customer Sevice
thread.title_full: Poor Customer Sevice - Review of Hyatt Regency San Francisco Airport - Burlingame, Burlingame, CA - TripAdvisor

author: B8982IDlisan
title: Poor Customer Sevice
text: Don't accidentally leave anything in your room - you will never see it or hear from the hotel again! Several calls and attempts to get my items back were ignored. They really did not care. I realized I had left a few clothing items in the drawers two hours after checking out. I called as soon as I realized and was told that housekeeping never found anything. I left my number and then called back a few times. They were not interested in helping my find my items. I won't be back.
